ovdesc.p: Contains the BGC BLOCK CODE and WENST ADDRESSEN flag for BGC accounts.

desc.p: Specifies the ACCOUNT for which the BGC parameter information applies.
Must be a valid T24 account, with a category defined on account class as a BGC account.
Contains a two digit BGC block code.
Required input must be on the file BGC.BLOCK.CODE.
Is a counterparty required for this account when sending out funds via the BGC.
This is sent out on the BGC TAPE as the WENST ADDRESSEN flag.
YES or NO, defaults to NO.
